items.sentence: Tom sent Mary letters, but she never answered them.
Tom walked out to the balcony with a cup of coffee.
Tom got very angry when he saw what Mary was doing.
I'm pretty sure Tom doesn't live in Boston anymore.
Tom is thirty years old, but he looks much younger.
Tom helped himself to another serving of ice cream.
Why do you talk about Tom as if he were an old man?
There's not enough space in my car for anyone else.
I wish that I'd remembered to buy flowers for Mary.
Tom wasn't sure if Mary really meant what she said.
